ygData.subject: RE: Aviaks and feign
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah harriers do come back, well at least the one I fought did any ways. ... From: Adam Hayek [mailto:Adam@thirdlaw.com] Sent: Thursday, October 14, 1999 11:47
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah harriers do come back, well at least the one I fought did any ways.

-----Original Message-----
From: Adam Hayek [mailto:Adam@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 14, 1999 11:47 AM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Aviaks and feign


From: Adam Hayek <Adam@...>

I dont know about harriers, but i know that Avocets will definitely come
back and attack you after you get up from a feign.



> From: "Lombard.Mikhael" <Mikhael_Lombard@...>
> Subject: RE: Digest Number 91
>
> I have a question for all the higher level monks out there. I am of
> the 26th
> season and I was wondering, when you solo the aviak guards in Lake
> Rathe if
> you need to feign death you can, then you can stand right back up and
> bandage and continue on with the fight, my question is can you do the
> same
> to aviaks in the aviak village, I was wondering because if you can
> that
> means I can solo harriers instead of just rooks. Thank you for your
> time. Oh
> by the way I bought my BP Choker last night, and now I am broke, but I
> am a
> satisfied broke hehehe, and I also traded for a Shralok Pack for my
> opal
> electrum necklace too.
>
>
